descriptionHtml:
Lydia companion/housecarl mod v1.0

This is the modifications settings to this character..

- Can now be married.
- Default outfit changed to nocturnal.
- Removed default weapons so bow always strapped to her back is gone.
- Changed bitchy carry dialogue to \"What do you want me to carry?\"
- Added healingspells so she can now heal herself in battle.
- Made her essential.
- Changed lip color from lightbrown to lightred.
- Changed combatstyle so she won\'t prefere 1H/2H


This mod works best with less bitchy Lydia , as I just edited the dialoge text.

Also would recomend Skyheals mod to go with the nocturnal outfit and some nude mod to not make underwear show.

Thanks alot to.:

XTR3M368
for Lydia marriage fixed and more which tought me how to marry Lydia
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6301

rabidstoat
for Less Bitchy Lydia which provides the correct voicefile
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7700

electionis
for SkyHeels in screenshot which I love her to wear with her default outfit :)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5589
author: FelixLynxx
